articles.title: Israeli, European researchers discover closest black holes known to man - Ynetnews
articles.description: Prof. Zvi Mazeh says proud of Israeli research team's involvement in the discovery, scientific community looks forward to further expanding new population of dormant black holes
articles.content:
In a joint study published last week by Tel Aviv University and the European Space Agency, researchers discovered the first and second closest black holes to Earth.
The black holes, Gaia BH1 and Gai… [+1843 chars]

articles.title: Drug trafficking blamed as homicides soar in Costa Rica - CBS News
articles.description: Costa Rica had become an "enormous warehouse" of drugs and an operations center for exports to Europe, authorities said.
articles.content: In this colorful Caribbean port, where cruise ship passengers are whisked to jungle adventures in Costa Rica's interior, locals try to be home by dark and police patrol with high-caliber guns in the … [+5718 chars]
